trans-unit.source: Represents a security token that is based upon an X.509 certificate.
To get the details of the X.509 certificate, access the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: X.509 証明書の詳細を取得するには、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> プロパティにアクセスします。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" /> class.
An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> that contains the X.509 certificate.
Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate" /> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" /> class using the specified X.509 certificate.

This constructor creates a unique identifier for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security token and assigns that value to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Id%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: このコンストラクターは、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> セキュリティ トークンの一意の識別子を作成し、その値を <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Id%2A> プロパティに割り当てます。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> that contains the X.509 certificate.
Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate" /> property.
A unique identifier of the security token.
Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Id" /> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" /> class using the specified X.509 certificate and unique identifier.
<paramref name="certificate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="id" /> is null.
A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> that specifies the key identifier to create.
trans-unit.target: 作成するキー識別子を指定する <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this security token is capable of creating the specified key identifier.

<see langword="true" /> when <paramref name="T" /> is of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause" />, or <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The key identifier for an X.509 certificate can be expressed using many different key identifier clauses.
trans-unit.target: X.509 証明書のキー識別子は、複数の異なるキー識別句を使用して表現できます。

trans-unit.source: These key identifier clauses are represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause> classes.
trans-unit.target: これらのキー識別子句は、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause>、および <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause> の各クラスによって表されます。

trans-unit.source: Gets the X.509 certificate associated with the security token.
An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" /> that contains the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: X.509 証明書を含む <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> property to get the details about the X.509 certificate associated with the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security token.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> プロパティを使用して、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> セキュリティ トークンに関連付けられた X.509 証明書の詳細を取得します。

trans-unit.source: For instance, the thumbprint of the X.509 certificate can be accessed using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.Thumbprint%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: たとえば、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.Thumbprint%2A> プロパティを使用して、X.509 証明書の拇印にアクセスできます。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> that specifies the key identifier to create.
trans-unit.target: 作成するキー識別子を指定する <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates the specified key identifier clause.
A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> that is a key identifier clause for the security token.

The return value for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.CreateKeyIdentifierClause%2A> method is one of the key identifier clause types that an X.509 certificate key identifier can be expressed in.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.CreateKeyIdentifierClause%2A> メソッドの戻り値は、X.509 証明書のキー識別子を表現できるキー識別子句のいずれかです。

trans-unit.source: The possible return types are represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause> classes.
trans-unit.target: 可能な戻り値の型は、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause>、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause>、および <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause> の各クラスによって表されます。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken" />.
Call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> method when you are finished using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> メソッドは、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> の使用が完了したときに呼び出します。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> メソッドによって、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> は使用不可の状態になります。

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> method, you must release all references to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> メソッドを呼び出した後、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> が使用していたメモリをガベージ コレクターが再利用できるように、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> への参照をすべて解放する必要があります。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Dispose%2A> への最後の参照を解放する前に、必ず <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> を呼び出してください。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: そうしないと、ガベージ コレクターが <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> オブジェクトの `Finalize` メソッドを呼び出すまで、使用されているリソースは解放されません。

trans-unit.source: Gets a unique identifier of the security token.
A unique identifier of the security token.
trans-unit.target: セキュリティ トークンの一意の識別子。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the key identifier for this instance is equal to the specified key identifier.

<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="skiClause" /> is one of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SubjectKeyIdentifierClause" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509ThumbprintKeyIdentifierClause" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause" />, or <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509RawDataKeyIdentifierClause" /> types and the key identifier clauses match; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.MatchesKeyIdentifierClause%2A> method matches criteria in the X.509 certificate in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> property based on the type of the `keyIdentifierClause` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.MatchesKeyIdentifierClause%2A> メソッドは、<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> パラメーターの型に基づいて、`keyIdentifierClause` プロパティ内の X.509 証明書の条件を照合します。

trans-unit.source: The following table details what is matched.
trans-unit.target: 照合される対象を次の表に示します。

trans-unit.source: Key identifier clause type
trans-unit.target: キー識別子句型。

trans-unit.source: What is matched
trans-unit.target: 照合対象

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.IssuerName%2A> property and the issuer serial number returned from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetSerialNumber%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.IssuerName%2A> プロパティの値と、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetSerialNumber%2A> メソッドから返される発行者シリアル番号。

trans-unit.source: The data returned from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetRawCertData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetRawCertData%2A> メソッドから返されるデータ。

trans-unit.source: The subject key identifier extension in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.Extensions%2A> property is matched.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.Extensions%2A> プロパティのサブジェクト キー識別子の拡張。

trans-unit.source: The thumbprint that is returned by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetCertHash%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.GetCertHash%2A> メソッドによって返される拇印。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cryptographic keys associated with the security token.

A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" /> that contains the set of keys associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: セキュリティ トークンに関連付けられている一連のキーを含む、<see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> 型の <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.SecurityKeys%2A> property to set the cryptographic keys for this security token to protect a SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.SecurityKeys%2A> プロパティを使用して、このセキュリティ トークンの暗号キーを設定し、SOAP メッセージを保護します。

trans-unit.source: The keys can be used, among other things, to digitally sign or encrypt SOAP messages.
trans-unit.target: このキーは、特に SOAP メッセージのデジタル署名または暗号化に使用できます。

trans-unit.source: Throws an exception if the <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ThrowIfDisposed" /> method has been called for this instance.
the <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ThrowIfDisposed" /> method has been called for this instance.
Gets the first instant in time at which this security token is valid.
A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the instant in time at which this security token is first valid.
trans-unit.target: このセキュリティ トークンの有効期間の開始時点を示す <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> property is specified in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and is the value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.NotBefore%2A> property of the X.509 certificate specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> プロパティは、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.NotBefore%2A> プロパティで指定された X.509 証明書の <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> プロパティの値であり、世界協定時刻 (UTC) で指定されます。

trans-unit.source: Gets the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.
A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that represents the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.
trans-unit.target: このセキュリティ トークンの有効期間の終了の時点を示す <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> property is specified in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and is the value of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.NotAfter%2A> property of the X.509 certificate specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A> プロパティは、<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.NotAfter%2A> プロパティで指定された X.509 証明書の <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken.Certificate%2A> プロパティの値であり、世界協定時刻 (UTC) で指定されます。
